title: China’s EV Growth Is Stagnating. Is That Another Nail in the Coffin for Tesla Stock?
description: Is a slowdown in the Chinese EV market leaving Tesla’s stock vulnerable to a downturn? Let's find out.
content: A slowdown in Chinas electric vehicle (EV) sales has revived murmurs of another blow to Tesla (TSLA). While September saw the companys EV sales grow 15.5% year-over-year, the growth rate slowed down … [+4074 chars]
